A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The problem I have with The Last Jedi is with the many different plots happening\, especially with the Canto Bight scenes. All the characters were poorly written and I didn't care any of them. The stuff that was built up from The Force Awakens was discarded and questions from it were ignored. While the visual effects and music were good\, the plot\, characters\, and dialogue were awful.
